headline: Hardware vs. IP: How to trade the gaming industry
summary: Wedbush Securities managing director of strategic planning Michael Pachter compares which stocks have more leverage in the gaming space — the companies that build the hardware, like Nvidia (NVDA), or the developers with the actual video game IP (intellectual property). Pachter also comments on the hype around Take-Two Interactive's (TTWO) long-awaited Grand Theft Auto VI, expected to come out next year. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
